name: Double Dragon®
description:
Join Billy as he fights through his enemies via various attacks such as punches, kicks and throws, as well as a myriad of different weapons to attack
with in order to save his girlfriend, Marian. Many enemies will try and stop
you from reaching the end of each stage, some with powerful weapons to defeat you with. But if you can knock them down, you can make those weapons your own. Various bosses will
block your way at the end of each stage, but if you're strong enough and
possess the skills to defeat them, the path to Marian will lay open to you.

Can you defeat your enemies and save
your girl!? Only you can make it happen!
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
